title: "1. Open Science in Sweden "
date: today

::: {.callout-tip}
### Learning Objectives

By the end of this session, participants will be able to:

- Explain what Open Science is, and discuss the benefits and challenges that come with its 
implementation  

- Summarize the National Roadmap for Open Science and how it will be 
implemented in Sweden over the coming years  

:::
